title: LoL Stat - Windows Apps on Microsoft Store (WP8.1/Windows 8.1/Windows10)

embed.description: Download this app from Microsoft Store for Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 10, Windows Phone 8, Windows Phone 8.1. See screenshots, read the latest customer reviews, and compare rati

body:
Hi,
i come here to present my app for (WP8.1/Windows 8.1/Windows10)

With LoL Stat you can :
- Show recent games
- Show current game
- Store summoner
- Show ranking information
- Show ranked stat by champion

You can do some suggestion if you want.
I thank PlumeO for her help (draw the logo).

More info here : http://youtpout.github.io/LoL-Stat/

> LoL Stat isn't endorsed by Riot Games and doesn't reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. League of Legends and Riot Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. League of Legends © Riot Games, Inc.
>
